description: Use this application to instantiate a Control Plane with identity access management to control your Fast Data Runtime with just a few clicks
name: Fast Data Control Plane With Access Control

api-gateway.name: api-gateway
api-gateway.description: Envoy API Gateway to route requests to the correct service and verify the need of authentication

control-plane.name: control-plane
control-plane.description: Control Plane allows management of a Fast Data runtime deployment

redis-auth.name: redis-auth
redis-auth.description: Control Plane Redis Database employed to support authentication flow

files.content:
## GENERIC ##
port 6379
# listen on all the interfaces for incoming connections
bind 0.0.0.0

## NO DISK PERSISTENCE ##
save ""
appendonly no

## SECURITY ##
protected-mode yes

# NOTE: +@connection is necessary to be placed after -@dangerous, otherwise the user won't have the permissions to connect to Redis
user {{CP_REDIS_USERNAME}} on +@all -@dangerous +@connection allkeys allchannels >{{CP_REDIS_PASSWORD}}

# disable default user
user default off
files.name: redis.conf

control-plane-login-site.name: control-plane-login-site
control-plane-login-site.description: Control Plane Frontend employed to support authentication flow

authentication-service.name: authentication-service
authentication-service.description: Use Mia-Platform core Authentication Service to provide OAuth2 compliant user authentication API.

authorization-service.name: authorization-service
authorization-service.description: Use this service to authorize routes to request certain resources, leveraging OpenID Connect and simple user-defined configurations

files.name: auth.json

crud-service.name: crud-service
crud-service.description: Use Mia-Platform core Crud Service to manage different instances of the service.

files.name: cp-users.json

files.content:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">

<head>
  <base href="/control-plane-manager/" target="_blank" />

  <title>Fast Data Runtime Management</title>

  <link rel="icon" type="image/png" href="https://www.mia-platform.eu/static/img/favicon/apple-icon-60x60.png" />
  <link rel="stylesheet" nonce="**CSP_NONCE**" href="./assets/style.css" />

  <script type="module" nonce="**CSP_NONCE**"
    src="https://cdn.mia-platform.eu/backoffice/bk-web-components/{{BACK_KIT_VERSION}}/dist/bk-loading-animation.esm.js">
  </script>

  <script type="module" nonce="**CSP_NONCE**"
    src="https://cdn.mia-platform.eu/micro-lc/orchestrator/{{MICRO_LC_VERSION}}/dist/micro-lc.production.js"></script>
</head>

<body>
  <bk-loading-animation primary-color="#2cb47b">
    <micro-lc config-src="/micro-lc-configurations/config.json"></micro-lc>
  </bk-loading-animation>
</body>

</html>
